name: Fasty Monster 2
description:
Fasty Monster 2 is a tribute to the classic Packman game however with significantly different game play.

You'll get more beasts if you can ricochet your monster to get the flying red heart before it disappears!

Have fun being the fasty monsters playing in this multi-stage Packman + Ricochet + Strategy game! As always, be Fasty and beat your friends in high scores!
